choose.otherwise: `id` AS `id`, `user_id` AS `userId`, `platform` AS `platform`, `order_id` AS `orderId`, `direction` AS `direction`, `coin_type` AS `coinType`, `token` AS `token`, `contract` AS `contract`, `sender_address` AS `senderAddress`, `receiver_address` AS `receiverAddress`, `amount` AS `amount`, `block` AS `block`, `tx` AS `tx`, `trade_step` AS `tradeStep`, `operation_type` AS `operationType`, `transfer_flag` AS `transferFlag`, `flag` AS `flag`, `remark` AS `remark`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`
